summary: This bill, the Licensing Aerospace Units to New Commercial Heights Act (LAUNCH Act), aims to streamline regulations and licensing processes for the commercial space industry. It focuses on evaluating existing regulations (Part 450), establishing a rulemaking committee, promoting innovation, and modifying application procedures. It mandates a digital licensing system, annual briefings to Congress, direct hiring authority for relevant positions, and the establishment of a Commercial Space Transportation Administration. The bill also addresses flight safety analysis, streamlines licensing for private remote sensing space systems, and calls for a GAO report on Department of Commerce policies related to remote sensing.
